item.title: TikTok goes dark for some users ahead of ban
item.description: The TikTok ban went into effect on Saturday for some users.

item.title: Trump inauguration live updates: Incoming first family takes in fireworks show
item.description: There's a full slate of activities this weekend ahead of Monday's swearing-in ceremonies.

item.title: Jon Husted, Ohio's lieutenant governor, tapped to replace JD Vance in Senate
item.description: Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine on Friday announced his lieutenant governor, Jon Husted, will replace Vice President-elect JD Vance in the U.S. Senate.

item.title: Firefighters open up about losing their own homes in LA wildfires
item.description: Firefighters from the Pasadena Fire Department opened up about losing their own homes following wildfires in Los Angeles County.

item.title: Man's dramatic rescue of dog from freezing river in Vermont caught on video
item.description: A Vermont man waded into a river to rescue a dog that was struggling to escape the icy waters
